instruction: Analyze the user's request and determine which functions from the available list need to be called to fulfill the request. For each selected function, provide the appropriate input parameters (prompt/request body) that should be passed to the function.

roles.name: request_analyzer
roles.description: Understand the user's request and identify what they want to accomplish

roles.name: function_matcher
roles.description: Match the user's request to the most appropriate available functions

roles.name: parameter_generator
roles.description: Generate appropriate input parameters for each selected function based on the user's request
